imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear

Class Scaling2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear.LinearMapping2D
      • imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear.ProjectiveMapping2D
        • imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear.AffineMapping2D
          • imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear.Scaling2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Mapping2D, Cloneable

    public class Scaling2D
extends AffineMapping2D
    This class represents a 2D scaling transformation (as a special case of affine transformation).

      • Scaling2D

        public Scaling2D(double sx,
                 double sy)
        Constructor. Creates a mapping that scales along the x- and y-axis by the associated factors.
        Parameters:
        sx - the scale factor in x-direction
        sy - the scale factor in y-direction

      • Scaling2D

        public Scaling2D(double s)
        Constructor. Creates a uniform scaling in x and y.
        Parameters:
        s - the common scale factor
